meanings.definition: To decorate or furnish with statues.
meanings.sent1: The park was statued with beautiful sculptures.
meanings.sent2: She statued the garden with small figurines.
meanings.sent3: The room looked statued with all the action figures on the shelves.
meanings.sent4: The museum was statued with ancient artifacts, bringing history to life.
meanings.sent5: The city square was statued with monuments honoring great leaders.

meanings.sent1: The artist statued the clay into a magnificent sculpture.
meanings.sent2: He statued the marble into a lifelike bust.
meanings.sent3: The magician statued his assistant as part of his disappearing act.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor statued the rock, transforming it into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The craftsman statued the metal, creating a masterpiece for all to admire.
